element.name: TADConverter
element.descr: This is an abstract class for Analgo/Digital Converters (ADC). Typically each ADC requires an individual implementation for data access, so create derived classes for each ADC. You must override all abstract methods to enable reading of single pin data. If the chip also supports differential or pseudo differential measurement, you should override DifferentialValue and GetDifferentialValue, also.

element.name: TADConverter.DifferentialValue
element.descr: Some A/D-converters support differential or pseudo differential measurement. Check SupportsDifferentialValue before usage. Please consult the datasheet of your device on information how connectors are used in differential measuring.
element.errors: Raises if used but is not supported.

element.name: EDifferentialNotSupported.Create
element.short: Create new instance with predefined message
element.descr: Creates a new exception object with predefined text.
